name: pnp-list-formatting-emotions-format
title: Emotions emoji
shortDescription: This sample allow the selection of emotions emojis based on html unicode in 2 formats Emotions-single-format and Emotions-format.
longDescription: This sample allow the selection of emotions emojis based on html unicode in 2 formats Emotions-single-format and Emotions-format.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
